pages.text: $(mod)GIRC Redstone$() allows for wirelessly transmitting redstone signals.$(br2)Place a $(item)WLR Emitter$() at the source, and a $(item)WLR Acceptor$() at the destination.$(br2)Use the $(item)WLR Linker$() first on the Acceptor and then the Emitter to link the two.
When the Emitter is given a redstone signal, it will be sent out of the Acceptor.
